burtis.modules.simulation.models

Class BusStopManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • burtis.modules.simulation.models.BusStopManager

  • public class BusStopManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages bus stops in simulation module.
    Author:
    Mikołaj Sowiński

    • Constructor Detail

      • BusStopManager

        public BusStopManager(java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String>> busStopsList,
                      Depot depot,
                      java.util.logging.Logger logger)
        Constructor. Creates bus stops using data from supplied list. The last of supplied bus stops will be of terminus class.
        Parameters:
        busStopsList - - list of entries describing bus stops.
        depot - - reference to the depot object.
        logger - - the logger to be used.

    • Method Detail

      • getFirstBusStop

        public BusStop getFirstBusStop()
        Returns first bus stop in the line.
        Returns:
        first bus stop

      • getNextBusStop

        public BusStop getNextBusStop(BusStop currentBusStop)
                       throws NoSuchBusStopException
        Searches for bus stop next to the one given as argument. If terminus is given as an argument terminus is returned.
        Parameters:
        currentBusStop - - the bus stop to start search from, and find next to it.
        Returns:
        next bus stop on the route.
        Throws:
        NoSuchBusStopException - if bus stop given as argument does not exist

      • busStopExists

        public BusStop busStopExists(BusStop busStop)
                      throws NoSuchBusStopException
        Checks if given bus stop exists.
        Parameters:
        busStop - - the bus stop to be checked.
        Returns:
        the bus stop given as argument, for chaining methods.
        Throws:
        NoSuchBusStopException - if bus stop does not exist

      • getTerminus

        public Terminus getTerminus()
        Returns:
        reference to the terminus.

      • getBusStopByName

        public BusStop getBusStopByName(java.lang.String name)
                         throws NoSuchBusStopException
        Searches for a bus stop with given name.
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of the bus stop to be found.
        Returns:
        bus stop of given id.
        Throws:
        NoSuchBusStopException - - when there is no bus stop with given name.
